description: Debug faster with AI agents that access video recordings, console logs, and network requests
author: Jam
content: Access Jam bug recordings and debug information to troubleshoot issues more efficiently.
features: Review error messages and stack traces

steps: Add the Jam server configuration with HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport http jam https://mcp.jam.dev/mcp

useCases: Debug production issues with full context

troubleshooting.solution: Implement exponential backoff with increasing delays between retries. Monitor rate limit headers in API responses. Distribute requests over time rather than burst operations to stay within limits.

troubleshooting.issue: Cannot access bug recordings or debug data
troubleshooting.solution: Verify workspace permissions grant access to recordings. Check your account role has viewer or higher permissions. Ensure recording ID is correct and recording hasn't been deleted.

troubleshooting.issue: Console logs or network data incomplete
troubleshooting.solution: Verify Jam browser extension was active during bug recording. Check privacy settings don't block sensitive data capture. Ensure user had console open when error occurred for complete logs.

troubleshooting.issue: Video playback fails or shows blank screen
troubleshooting.solution: Check browser supports video format and codecs. Verify recording completed successfully and wasn't interrupted. Clear browser cache and retry. Contact Jam support if corruption suspected.
